name: Super Nippon Removals: Ascension of Extend
name_original: Super Nippon Removals: Ascension of Extend
description:
VOTE FOR THIS GAME!
http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-37/?action=p...

House Prices are insane nowadays!

People can't afford to rent more than ONE ROOM

Help move people into their new apartments

Bring us great honor!

_________________________________

There's a tutorial, but just in-case, the controls are:

Left Mouse Button = Click, grab, drag

Right Mouse Button = Rotate things

Esc = Quit

Made this in Game Maker: Studio, the music was done in Ableton Live, and the sounds were done in SFXR and Audacity

Made for Ludum Dare 37, the theme was One Room
